meanings.definition: To give oneself too much of something enjoyable, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: I overindulge in sweets and end up feeling sick.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overindulge in shopping whenever she's stressed.
meanings.sent3: After the party, I realized I had overindulged in cake and regretted it.
meanings.sent4: His love for desserts is so strong that he can't help but overindulge.
meanings.sent5: The buffet was so tempting that I couldn't resist overindulging in all the delicious dishes.

meanings.definition: To allow oneself to have or do too much of something enjoyable.
meanings.sent1: Don't overindulge in screen time before bed; it can affect your sleep.
meanings.sent2: It's important to enjoy treats but not to overindulge in them.
meanings.sent3: I tend to overindulge in watching my favorite TV show on weekends.
meanings.sent4: She overindulged in relaxation during her vacation, forgetting all her worries.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to overindulge in fun activities during the holidays and forget about responsibilities.
